QueryToExecute:
select
  arn as resource,
  case
    when logging_status ->> 'LoggingEnabled' = 'true' then 'ok'
    else 'alarm'
  end as status,
  case
    when logging_status ->> 'LoggingEnabled' = 'true' then title || ' logging enabled.'
    else title || ' logging disabled.'
  end as reason
  
  , region, account_id
from
  aws_redshift_cluster;
